name: Secret Santa (itch) (dos)
description:
You're Santa, and you have to be secret. There's a lot of drones around, recording the neighborhood in hopes to catch hot footage of you delivering Xmas gifts. Don't let them! Stay stealthy and lift off the chimneys unnoticed.

Made on KrampusHack 2021 for user DeathPenguin, who wanted "a game with spy/stealth/assassination type gameplay".
